title: Add ESLint and Prettier
description: Install ESLint + Prettier, configure for web components, add npm scripts (lint, lint:fix, format). Run initial format pass on codebase.

title: Generate Custom Elements Manifest
description: Install @custom-elements-manifest/analyzer. Configure analyzer for the component. Generate custom-elements.json for IDE support. Update package.json exports. Add npm script: analyze

title: Improve mobile touch targets
description: Increase control button touch targets (44px minimum). Add responsive breakpoint for narrow screens. Consider hiding URL bar text on very small screens. Test on mobile viewport sizes.

title: Add Web Test Runner
description: Install @web/test-runner and @open-wc/testing. Create test configuration. Write initial test suite covering: component renders, attributes, light/dark mode, minimize/maximize states, source view toggle. Add npm scripts: test, test:watch

title: Add CSS-based resize
description: Add resize: both and overflow: auto to host element. Ensure source view follows container size. Add min-width/min-height constraints. Test maximize mode still works properly.

title: Respect prefers-color-scheme
description: Add auto theme detection with prefers-color-scheme media query. Keep mode attribute as override (explicit mode wins). Logic: mode attribute > system preference > light default. Add tests for theme behavior.

title: Expand demos and documentation
description: Create demo showcasing all features (light/dark, resize, source view). Add demo for each attribute combination. Update README with comprehensive usage examples. Document CSS custom properties.
